chapter.text: 88|1|[Ej Pajomʙar] Ojo xaʙari qijomati havlnoki farogir ʙa tu rasidaast
88|2|Dar on ruz cehrahoe xoru zalil xohand ʙud
88|3|[Dar dunjo] Pajvasta talos karda [va] xasta suda [va cun dar rohi haq naʙuda, naticae nadidaand]
88|4|Dar otasi suzon darmeojand
88|5|Az casmai ʙisjor garm ʙa onho nusonda mesavand
88|6|Ƣizoe cuz xori xusku talx nadorand
88|7|Ki na [ononro] farʙeh kunad va na gurusnagiro daf' menamojad
88|8|Dar on ruz cehrahoe sodoʙu toza hastand
88|9|Va az sa'j [-ju talos]-i xud xusnudand
88|10|Dar ʙihisti ʙarin hastand
88|11|Dar on co hec suxani ʙehudae namesunavand
88|12|Dar on casma [-hoi oʙ] ravon ʙosad
88|13|Dar on taxthoi [zeʙoi] ʙaland [poja] ast
88|14|Va comhoe [ki dar kanori casmaho] nihoda suda
88|15|Va ʙolisthoi [munazzam] cidasuda
88|16|Va [niz] farshoi garonʙaho gusturda sudaast
88|17|Ojo [kofiron] ʙa sutur namenigarand, ki ci guna ofarida sudaast
88|18|Va ʙa osmon [namenigarand], ki ci guna ʙarafrosta sudaast
88|19|Va ʙa kuhho [namenigarand], ki ci guna [muhkam ʙar zamin] nasʙ sudaast
88|20|Va ʙa zamin [namenigarand], ki ci guna gusturda sudaast
88|21|Pas, [ej Pajomʙar] pand ʙideh, ki tu tanho panddihandai
88|22|Tu ʙar onon musallat [-u cira] nesti [ki ʙar imon vodorason kuni]
88|23|Ammo kase, ki ruj ʙigardonad va kofir savad
88|24|Sipas Alloh taolo uro ʙo ʙuzurgtarin azoʙ mucozot mekunad
88|25|Hamono ʙozgasti onho ʙa suji Most
88|26|Sipas ʙe gumon, hisoʙason [niz] ʙo Most
